sentences.sContent: Either side of a right triangle that is not the hypotenuse .
sentences.sContent_eng: Either side of a right triangle that is not the hypotenuse .
sentences.sCn: 直角三角形的斜边与一个角的对边之比。

sentences.sContent: Interviewer: Ok, so one last question. A right triangle has a hypotenuse equal to 10 and an altitude to the hypotenuse equal to 6.
sentences.sContent_eng: Interviewer: Ok, so one last question. A right triangle has a hypotenuse equal to 10 and an altitude to the hypotenuse equal to 6.
sentences.sCn: 一位计算机系的毕业生接受微软的面试，面试官给出最后一个问题：“已知一个直角三角形的斜边为10，斜边上的高为6，请问这个三角形的面积是多少？”

trans.tranOther: the longest side of a  triangle  that has a  right angle
